title: Central Air/Heating, Pantry, Corner unit, 2 patios, Pet friendly
map_address: 1625 Crenshaw Boulevard near Venice Blvd/Crenshaw Blvd
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 700 Sq.

In the heart of Lafayette Square, minutes from Miracle Mile and K-town Lafayette Place is brightened by sunlight streaming in from floor-to-ceiling windows in common areas such as the Fitness Center and Lounge.
The modern feel of these large 1 & 2-bedroom apartments is highlighted by the updated interiors, new stainless-steel appliances, kitchen cabinetry and large windows throughout the community.
Residents can also enjoy the conveniences of having an on-site fitness center, as well as a recreational pool area for summer in L.A.

Two Patios - One Per Bedroom*, Views of Hollywood Sign (3rd Floor Units, North Side)*, Microwave, Hardwood Floors, Pantry, Central Air/Heating, Walk In Closets (Master Bedroom)*, Tile Floor in Bathroom & Laundry Room, Cable Ready, Stainless Steel Kitchen Appliances, Refrigerator, Mirrored Closet Doors, Laundry Storage Area*, Dishwasher, Neolux Blinds*

Leasing Office, Access to Public Transportation, Shimmering Swimming Pool, Public Parks Nearby, Cable Ready, Patios In All Units, Easy Access to Shopping, Easy Access to Freeways, Elevator, Assigned Parking, Covered Parking, Dog Run Area, Controlled Access Building/Gated
